text: Hi hi! Looks like I made it just on time!
So, after our last date, I decided to apply for a new job.
Super hard! But I figured I should at least try.
It was mostly just tiring to be honest, but I learned a lot too.
…You don’t sound too interested. Still, it’s thanks to you I even tried.
And guess what? I got the job! So… I just wanted to say thanks. For motivating me to put my all into it.
And you really did help. This might be dramatic of me, but I really am glad we met.
I really do feel stronger when we talk… I hope it’s not just me. Let’s push each other to be our very best!
That’s sweet of you to say! Still, I couldn’t have done it without you.
You’re a good friend. If you ever need of some help, let me know. I’m happy to support you!”
Probably not in a new job. Still, can’t say I like the way you said that…
Well, I wanted to thank you, and now I have. I’ll get out of your hair now.
